about: I am a passionate Computer Science student with a strong foundation in
programming, algorithms, and software development. I love creating
innovative solutions and exploring new technologies.
Currently pursuing my degree while building practical projects that
showcase my skills and creativity. Always eager to learn and take on
new challenges in the world of technology.

projects.name: P2P Cloud Gaming Platform (ReflexGaming)
projects.description: Realtime P2P low-latency cloud gaming platform engineered with Windows and Direct3D11 APIs. Implemented NVENC with CUDA hardware acceleration for video and audio encoding resulting in latency as low as 15ms. Created a matchmaking server and integrated it with WebRTC and client/host side clients.
projects.techStack: C++, Go, Windows, Direct3D11, CUDA, WebRTC, FFmpeg, NodeJS

projects.name: 2D Game Engine
projects.description: Developed a 2D Game Engine using Java, GSON, LWJGL, OpenGL, OpenAL, and ImGui, focusing on enhancing development workflows. Key contributions included engineering intuitive Editor and Play scene interfaces with custom event listeners and an animation system, which improved development efficiency by 25%. Visual fidelity and performance were boosted by 15% through advanced rendering techniques like GLSL Shaders and texture batching. Additionally, a real-time adjustable Properties window was implemented, reducing iteration time by 30 minutes per session and increasing developer productivity by 20%. JBox2D was integrated for robust physics simulation.
projects.techStack: Java, GSON, LWJGL, OpenGL, OpenAL, ImGUI

projects.name: Raspberry Pi Record Player
projects.description: Integrated RFID scanner to detect album covers and trigger Spotify playlists, achieving seamless playback on RaspberryPi 5 as a Spotify Connect device. Developed Python scripts to map RFID tags to playlists, ensuring instant, accurate album playback and enhancing user interaction. Configured Raspberry Pi GPIO pins for reliable RFID tag detection, achieving high accuracy and seamless communication in the record player setup. Leveraged Spotify API for authentication and playback management, creating a streamlined experience for RFID-based music selection and control.
projects.techStack: RFID Stickers and Scanners, Python, SpotifyApi

responsibilities: Developed web applications using React and Node.js

Built responsive websites and web applications
Managed project timelines and client communications

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
